SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BackgroundManager
The BackgroundManager class is a singleton that manages the background colour and image of the game.
Command
The interface to a game command.
ControllerSetup
Provides a utility for initializing controllers based on screen types.
Eagle
Represents the eagle enemy in the game.
EagleController
Manages the behavior and interactions of eagle, such as movements.
EndScreen
Represents the end screen in the game.
EndScreenController
Controls the end screen of the game.
Fireball
Represents a fireball projectile in the game.
FireballController
Controls the creation and management of fireballs.
GameController
Controls the game logic and interactions.
GameEndState
Represents the game end state.
GameInitializer
Provides utility methods to initialize and start the game.
GamePhysics
Manages the physics interactions and collision detection in the game.
GameState
Represents a state in the game.
GameStateController
Manages the game state transitions and updates.
GameUpdater
Updates the game state and handles player movements, collisions, and level progression.
GameView
Represents the view for the game.
HighScoreUtils
Provides utility methods for reading and writing high scores.
InfoScreen
Represents the information screen in the game.
InfoScreenController
Controls the behavior of the information screen.
InputHandler
Handles the player's input actions.
JumpCommand
A command to make the player jump.
LevelData
Holds the data for the game levels.
LevelLoader
Loads and initialises game levels and their components.
LevelModel
Represents the model for a game level.
LevelPassState
Represents the level pass state.
Main
The main entry point for the game application.
MainScreen
Represents the main screen in the game.
MainScreenController
Controls the main screen of the game.
Money
Represents a money item in the game.
MoneyController
Manages the collection and interactions of money items in the game.
MoveLeftCommand
A command to move the player to the left.
MoveRightCommand
A command to move the player to the right.
OptionScreen
Represents the options screen in the game.
OptionScreenController
Controls the options screen of the game.
Player
Represents the player character in the game.
PlayerController
Controls the player's movements and interactions with the game environment.
PlayingState
Represents the playing state in the game.
ScoreController
Manages the player's score during the game.
ScoreModel
Represents the model for tracking the player's score.
ScoreObserver
Observes changes in the player's score.
ScoreView
Displays the player's score in the game UI.
Screen
Represents a screen in the game.
ScreenBaseController
Provides a base class for screen controllers in the game.
ScreenFactory
Factory class for creating and configuring screens.
ScreenType
This enum represents different ScreenType and encapsulate FXML file path and title of each screen.
ScreenType.Constants
The Constants class contains constant values for file paths to FXML files for different screens and the titles for each screen.
ShootFireballCommand
A command to shoot a fireball.
Snake
Represents a snake enemy in the game.
